title: We're Live!
summary: Today marks the occasion of me finally finishing the first version of my portfolio website (this one)! I hadn’t finished a website 100% independently before now. I had a great time! I’ve attached some behind-the-scenes, handwritten notes.

title: Goodbye MS Word :(
summary: Today I opened up Microsoft Word to take notes on the autonomic nervous system, when I saw a tiny yellow banner at the top announcing terrible news: MS WORD IS NO LONGER!! So I, of course, got to scheming.
